Package com.ojcoleman.europa.core

Contains mostly interfaces and abstract classes that form the core components of an evolutionary algorithm.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Function<I,O>
    Interface for any object that takes input and produces output.
    Parallel.Operation<T>
    An operation to be performed on a single element.
    Stringable
    Interface for classes whose current state may be converted into a human-readable String by Stringer.toString(Object).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Allele<G extends Gene>
    Base class for representations of alleles within a Genotype.
    DefaultEvolver<G extends Genotype<?>>
    A default Evolver that selects DefaultEvolver.parentsProportion of the highest ranked Individuals from the Population, or each Species if applicable, and produces new members via recombination and/or cloning and mutation to replace the current members.
    DummyEvaluator
    Dummy evaluator used for printing configuration options.
    DummyGenotype
    Dummy genotype used for printing configuration options.
    DummyMutator
    Dummy mutator used for printing configuration options.
    DummyTranscriber
    Dummy evaluator used for printing configuration options.
    EvaluationData
    Container for the result of evaluating an Individual with an Evaluator.
    EvaluationDescription
    Defines the properties of an evaluation performed by an Evaluator.
    Evaluator
    Base class for classes used to evaluate the fitness of Individuals in the evolutionary algorithm.
    Evolver<G extends Genotype<?>>
    Base class for classes that generate the (@link Individual)s for an initial Population and then produce new Individuals based on recombination and mutation of existing members of the population (once they've been evaluated and ranked).
    Gene
    Base class for representations of genes within a Genotype.
    Genotype<A extends Allele<?>>
    Represents the inheritable genetic material of an Individual.
    History
    Base class of classes that store information about previous generations of populations and individuals.
    Individual<G extends Genotype<?>,F extends Function<?,?>>
    Represents an individual in the Population used in the evolutionary algorithm.
    Log
    Class to specify and record log items.
    Monitor
    Base class of classes that monitor the state of the evolutionary process.
    Mutator<G extends Genotype<?>>
    Base class for all classes that mutate a Genotype.
    Parallel
    Utility class for performing parallel iteration over generic Collections or anything that implements the Iterable interface.
    Parallel.DaemonThreadFactory
    ThreadFactory to create daemon threads.
    Population<G extends Genotype<?>,F extends Function<?,?>>
    Represents the population of Individuals in the evolutionary algorithm.
    Ranker<G extends Genotype<?>,F extends Function<?,?>>
    A component that ranks the individuals in a population.
    Recombiner<G extends Genotype<?>>
    Base class for all classes that mutate a Genotype.
    Run
    Initiates and manages an evolutionary run, implementing the basic core cycle of evaluating a population and then producing a new population according to the results.
    Speciator<G extends Genotype<?>,S extends Species<G>>
    Base class of classes that divide a Population into Species.
    Species<G extends Genotype<?>>
    Represents a species in the evolutionary algorithm.
    Transcriber<G extends Genotype<?>,F extends Function<?,?>>
    A Transcriber transcribes a Genotype to a "phenotype" Function.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Population.Event  
    Run.Event
    Run event types.

Package com.ojcoleman.europa.core Description

Contains mostly interfaces and abstract classes that form the core components of an evolutionary algorithm. A Run is the base component. Also contains some basic
